summary: Adds some info on the \"Race Menu\" for each races abilities etc
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to the character descriptions at the \"race menu\" a little more info on the abilities of each race.

--------------------------

This mod changes the description of each race while still keeping most of the vanilla comments.
Unfortunately due to the restriction of length some details had to be shortened


To Install
----------

1. Put the Races.esp file into your \"Data\" folder.
2. Tick the Races.esp in your load order.

To Remove
---------

1. Delete the Races.esp file


Note
---------

This is an English only version.
This was made using the awesome \"SkyEdit\" by Dave Humphrey & Co
author: Leon Fenten
